name: Whirl (mediamonster)
description:
Made for a game jam with the theme "The Player Is the Enemy," Whirl is a game where the player is stuck at the base of a whirlpool and must fire bullets out at the obstacles coming in at them. If the player misses, their bullet becomes an obstacle swirling back in at them. In this prototype, the player is indicated by the green cube in the center, and the direction they are facing is denoted by the red dot.

*click 'start' to begin the game

*press space to shoot

*use the left and right arrow keys to rotate
